room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie: Mutation" by Raleigh Room Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
room_description:
As punishment for sacrificing countless numbers to the undead Dr. Oxy in Trapped In A Room With A Zombie, Professor Von Guttenberg finds themselves as the one in chains and no longer in control of their zombie.
Due to a mix up in formulas, Dr. Oxy has since mutated into a being even hungrier, light sensitive, and more insane than ever before. There is little light left... and it is fading fast. Can you escape before you find yourself in the same predicament as the Professor?
